member.name: T:Telerik.WinControls.UI.RadPdfViewer
member.summary: RadPdfViewer is a control that can visualize PDF documents straight in your application. It comes with a predefined UI that is intuitive and provides the means for utilizing the feautres of the control. Using the UI you can easily zoom in and out, and scroll the document in the viewer. You can also use pan. The control utilizes virtualization in order to guarantee good performance with larger documents.
